title: Valens Set To Be More Aggressive in 2021
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Cannabis is reaching more people in more ways and recent US elections show the green rush is here to stay. But what about Canada? Jeff Fallows, President of The Valens Company, explains why he came on board - what they're doing differently and better than its Canadian peers. Cycle of improvement; operational efficiencies, better cost profile, leading the charge of cannabis 3.0 and next generation products. CPG companies getting into cannabis, inflection points and paying attention to share price. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
